hero.title: Hi, I'm
hero.description: Student in Computer Science. Passionate about development, I love creating high-performance and well-structured applications, combining optimization and best practices.

about.title: About Me
about.summary: Passionate about computer science for several years, I started my journey with a BTS SIO, where I acquired solid foundations in development and system management. Wanting to deepen my knowledge, I continued with a BUT in Computer Science, allowing me to perfect my skills in software development, system architecture, and software engineering. I love designing optimized and well-structured applications, applying SOLID principles and best development practices. My expertise spans several technologies, including PHP, TypeScript, SQL, and Linux, with a particular interest in software architectures and backend systems. Always curious and eager to learn, I enjoy taking on new technical challenges and exploring innovative solutions to design high-performance and scalable applications.

exp.title: BTS Internship
exp.description: Design of a CRUD web application with React frontend and PHP Slim backend to modify information related to volcanoes.

exp.title: BTS Internship
exp.description: Design of a CRUD web application with Symfony and Docker to manage job additions from Talend.

exp.title: Pokemon TCG
exp.description: This university project is a modern web application developed with Vue 3 and Vite that allows users to manage a collection of Pokémon cards. The application provides an intuitive interface for exploring, collecting, and organizing Pokémon cards into different decks.
